Class SchemeWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.Writer

        +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.SchemeWriter
public class SchemeWriter
extends Writer

Provides hooks so you can define Java Writers in Skij.

Constructor Detail

SchemeWriter

public SchemeWriter(Procedure w,                    Procedure c,                    Procedure f)
Create a SchemeWriter.
Parameters:
r - A Scheme procedure that accepts characters to be written. The procedure should take 3 arguments: an array of chars, a start position, and a count.
c - A Scheme procedure of no arguments to handle EOF conditions.
f - A Scheme procedure of no arguments that flushes the buffers.
See Also:
Writer.write(int), Writer.close(), Writer.flush()
